connector.description:
Send data to an Apache Cassandra cluster.

This Kamelet expects JSON Array formatted data. The content of the JSON Array is used as input for the CQL Prepared Statement set in the query parameter.

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.connectionH.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.connectionHost
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.connectionH.description: The hostname(s) for the Cassandra server(s). Use a comma to separate multiple hostnames. Example: localhost

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.connectionP.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.connectionPort
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.connectionP.description: The port number(s) of the cassandra server(s). Use a comma to separate multiple port numbers. Example: 9042

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.keyspace.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.keyspace
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.keyspace.description: The keyspace to use. Example: customers

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.username.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.username
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.username.description: The username for accessing a secured Cassandra cluster.

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.password.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.password
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.password.description: The password for accessing a secured Cassandra cluster.

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.prepareStat.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.prepareStatements
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.prepareStat.description: If true, specifies to use PreparedStatements as the query. If false, specifies to use regular Statements as the query.

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.query.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.query
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.query.description: The query to execute against the Cassandra cluster table.

camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.extraTypeCo.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.extraTypeCodecs
camel.kamelet.cassandra-sink.extraTypeCo.description: To use a specific comma separated list of Extra Type codecs.
